channel.title: Javascript on Trevor Blanchard
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Trevor Blanchard

item.title: Post Primum
item.description: Welcome! Cheers! üç∑ While my roommate and I are stranded inside during this COVID-19 crises, we have been drinking more often than we probably should; and much of that consumption has been red wine. Now, we are not wine snobs, we will proudly buy all the sub $10 bottles we can find during a trip to the MLCC. But that’s not to say that we don’t enjoy finer wines or that we don’t have some pricier favorites.
